REPL(1)                           Msh Manual                           REPL(1)

NAME
       repl - easily access Msh's Ruby interpretor

SYNOPSIS
       repl

DESCRIPTION
       This is equivalent to

           #{binding.irb}  # if using IRB
           #{binding.pry}  # if using Pry

MSH
       Part of msh(1).

AUTHOR
       Copyright 2020, Mark Delk under the terms of the MIT license

Msh v0.1.0                        2020-03-21                           REPL(1)
